explanation: [0-0] On a white countertop, a hand holds a black pestle, placed inside a black mortar.

[0-3] Then the scene switches, two hands hold a golden rectangular object with the word "GOLD" printed on it. After opening the outer golden packaging, a yellow rectangular object is placed into the mortar. Then a hand appears on the right side, holding the black pestle and starts grinding until the yellow rectangular object is ground into a pile of yellow powder. Then the pestle stirs the powder.

[3-6] Then the scene switches, a right hand holds a transparent plastic bottle filled with small golden balls. Then the left hand unscrews the cap and pours the balls into the mortar. Then the right hand holds the pestle and continues to grind until the golden balls are ground up. It can be seen that the inside of the balls is white, and then the pestle mixes the crushed balls and the yellow powder inside.

[48-53] Afterward, the scene switches to a white countertop with a round white object on top. The object has a hole at the top and a white button next to it. Below the white object is a transparent, face-shaped object. Then a hand holding the syringe filled with yellow liquid injects the liquid into the hole of the white object. Immediately after, a small, silver object is thrown in as well. Next, the white button at the top is pressed, and at this moment, the words "SUBSCRIBE" in white letters on a red background and a small hand icon appear at the top of the screen. Subsequently, we see the yellow liquid flowing into the transparent face below, and the red background above turns white.
